content:
You want PA to add a note to include describing the patient compartment when discussing the Patient Merge Note?
This area is about the problem, not the solution.
I'm already re-wording to take out some suggested behaviour, don't really want to add more in that could be contradictory.
PA has called a short notice call today at 3pm eastern to cover issues like this one.
.. which means that it's too late to comment usefully....

We chose not to vote on this issue as wanted more feedback on it.
(no clear answer either way - but were leaning towards non persuasive)
the section doesn't talk about the solution, it talks about the problem
Compartment membership is part of the problem: how is affected by merging/linking?. I think that's the extent of what we wanted - pointing that out
Now that makes more sense (to me - or I might just be tired), I can word that tweak in there under the other tracker anyway.
